name: RecipeHub
description: A recipe-sharing platform where users can create accounts, post recipes, and engage with others. Built using Django DRF for the backend and React for the frontend.

name: Jokeshub
description: A jokes posting website where users can create an account, share jokes, and engage with others through likes and shares.

name: Garden Hub
description: A plant-selling platform where users can sign up and sell their plants, featuring a modern UI built with Tailwind CSS.

name: Medic House
tech: HTML, CSS, React, Bootstrap, Tailwind etc
description: A medical website where users can browse available services and purchase medical items after logging in.

name: Grape School
description: An educational website teaching users how to grow grapes on their land.

name: Biker Bro
description: A bike-related landing page showcasing various motorcycle models.

name: Nike Shoe
description: A landing page for Nike shoes displaying product highlights.

name: Panda Ecommerce
description: An e-commerce landing page showcasing products for online shopping.

name: Personal Gain
description: A personal productivity tracker where users can set goals, track tasks, and manage personal activities.

name: Haate Jai
description: A mini e-commerce website where users can browse products and purchase after creating an account.

name: Event Bro
description: An event management website where users can view, book, and cancel event tickets. Organizers can create events with limited seats.
